# WorldTrackingProvider.Error.Code.removeWorldAnchorFailed

**Case**

The error code for when a world-tracking provider can’t remove a world anchor.

## Declaration

```swift
case removeWorldAnchorFailed
```

## Determining causes for tracking failures

- **WorldTrackingProvider.Error.Code.addWorldAnchorFailed**: The error code for when a world-tracking provider can’t add a world anchor.
- **WorldTrackingProvider.Error.Code.worldAnchorLimitReached**: The error code for when a world-tracking provider reaches its world anchor limit.
